member.name: D3D12_INDIRECT_ARGUMENT_TYPE
member.summary: Specifies the type of the indirect parameter.

member.name: D3D12_INDIRECT_ARGUMENT_TYPE.D3D12_INDIRECT_ARGUMENT_TYPE_DRAW
member.summary: Indicates the type is a Draw call.

member.name: D3D12_INDIRECT_ARGUMENT_TYPE.D3D12_INDIRECT_ARGUMENT_TYPE_DRAW_INDEXED
member.summary: Indicates the type is a DrawIndexed call.

member.name: D3D12_INDIRECT_ARGUMENT_TYPE.D3D12_INDIRECT_ARGUMENT_TYPE_DISPATCH
member.summary: Indicates the type is a Dispatch call.

member.name: D3D12_INDIRECT_ARGUMENT_TYPE.D3D12_INDIRECT_ARGUMENT_TYPE_VERTEX_BUFFER_VIEW
member.summary: Indicates the type is a vertex buffer view.

member.name: D3D12_INDIRECT_ARGUMENT_TYPE.D3D12_INDIRECT_ARGUMENT_TYPE_INDEX_BUFFER_VIEW
member.summary: Indicates the type is an index buffer view.

member.name: D3D12_INDIRECT_ARGUMENT_TYPE.D3D12_INDIRECT_ARGUMENT_TYPE_CONSTANT
member.summary: Indicates the type is a constant.

member.name: D3D12_INDIRECT_ARGUMENT_TYPE.D3D12_INDIRECT_ARGUMENT_TYPE_CONSTANT_BUFFER_VIEW
member.summary: Indicates the type is a constant buffer view (CBV).

member.name: D3D12_INDIRECT_ARGUMENT_TYPE.D3D12_INDIRECT_ARGUMENT_TYPE_SHADER_RESOURCE_VIEW
member.summary: Indicates the type is a shader resource view (SRV).

member.name: D3D12_INDIRECT_ARGUMENT_TYPE.D3D12_INDIRECT_ARGUMENT_TYPE_UNORDERED_ACCESS_VIEW
member.summary: Indicates the type is an unordered access view (UAV).
